plot: In Greek mythology The Keres were female spirits of death and fate. Now, one of them will tell us 'The story of all stories,' which unfolds in the most terrible battlefield: within ourselves.
title: Keres
plot_es: In Greek mythology The Keres were female spirits of death and fate. Now, one of them will tell us 'The story of all stories,' which unfolds in the most terrible battlefield: within ourselves.
